topic.title: Harvester2 Help
topic.section:
The Help document for Harvester2 is designed to assist users in the process of browsing and searching content in the PKP Harvester. It is also intended to serve as a manual for Harvester2 that describes the scope and workings of this software. In addition to this Help document, users have access to this system's technical support person, who will be listed in About, under Contact.

That is, this help system is context specific; what one sees depend on one's role and location in the system.
